name: lit-element-state-decoupler
description: A lightweight utility for state handling outside of the component for litelements

scripts.release:beta: npm test && npm run build && npm publish --tag=beta
scripts.release:patch: npm test && npm run build && npm version patch -m 'Creating new release %s' && git push && git push --tags && gren release
scripts.release:minor: npm test && npm run build && npm version minor -m 'Creating new release %s' && git push && git push --tags && gren release
